summary: Modern-day New York City adaptation of Shakespeare's immortal story about Hamlet's plight to avenge his father's murder.
cast: Ethan Hawke|Kyle MacLachlan|Diane Venora|Sam Shepard|Bill Murray|Liev Schreiber|Julia Stiles|Karl Geary|Paula Malcomson|Steve Zahn|Dechen Thurman|Rome Neal|Jeffrey Wright|Paul Bartel|Casey Affleck|Robert Thurman|Tim Blake Nelson|John Wills Martin|Bernadette Jurkowski|Robert MacNeil|D.J. Dara|Sinead Dolan|Paul Ferriter|Larry Fessenden|Sarah Fiol|Tanya Gingerich|Paul Graham|Henry Griffin|India Reed Kotis|Ayun Halliday|Greg Kotis|Barry Manasch|Philip McKenney|Anne Nixon|Colin Puth|Charles Renfro|Giancarlo Roma|Thomas Roma|Kelly Sebastian|Bill Clinton|James Dean
title: Hamlet - Una historia eterna
